div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

Elementary Quiz Bowl members receiving their medals and plaque.

p.strong: Provide educational experiences in a positive, safe, and engaging environment in order to prepare students for success in an ever-changing world.

div.p: I am really excited about this opportunity! ANYONE is welcome to attend from the comfort of your home. Send me a message with your email and I will send you an invite! #FalconNation

Sophomore and junior students and parents- I am hosting a zoom meeting with Diana Watson from CCC on April 23rd at 7 pm to talk about taking college courses during high school. I will email your students the link, so please join us to learn more about starting college early!

Seniors and Parents: Graduation is a very important day. We want to celebrate this day with you, so we are waiting for restrictions to be lifted prior to holding a ceremony. Our goal is to have a ceremony this summer prior to next school year. Information will be shared out soon
Thank you Gary Thompson Agency and Wilcox CPI for helping us honor our seniors.
